== Getting Started

:revnumber: {project-version}

To get started with Eclipse Scout, we propose you to follow this tutorial: 

* <<tutorial_helloworld.adoc#hello-world-tutorial, Hello world Tutorial>>
** <<tutorial_helloworld.adoc#create-a-scout-project, Create a Scout Project>>
** <<tutorial_helloworld.adoc#run-the-application, Run the Application>>
* <<tutorial_existingdemo.adoc#import-existing-demo-application-tutorial, Import existing Demo Application Tutorial>>
** <<tutorial_existingdemo.adoc#import-projects, Import projects>>
** <<tutorial_existingdemo.adoc#start-the-application, Start the application>>
